UpdateSourceArgs: -NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; Set-Location -Path 'sauerbraten'; Write-Output \"Installing/updating server\";Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -UserAgent \"Wget/1.21.4\" -Uri 'https://sourceforge.net/projects/sauerbraten/files/latest/download' -OutFile 'sauerbraten.exe'; Start-Process -FilePath './sauerbraten.exe' -ArgumentList \"/S /D={{$FullRootDir}}\\" -Wait -NoNewWindow; if ($?) { Write-Output \"Server installed/updated\"; Remove-Item -Path 'sauerbraten.exe' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null }"

-c "cd sauerbraten && echo \"Installing/updating server\" && wget -qO sauerbraten.tar.bz2 https://sourceforge.net/projects/sauerbraten/files/sauerbraten/2020_11_29/sauerbraten_2020_12_29_linux.tar.bz2/download && tar -xjf sauerbraten.tar.bz2 --strip-components=1 && echo \"Server installed/updated\" && rm -f sauerbraten.tar.bz2"
